member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.IExplorerUtil
member.summary: A collection of useful operations for Vault Explorer to run.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.IExplorerUtil.UpdateFileProperties(Autodesk.Connectivity.WebServices.File,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Autodesk.Connectivity.WebServices.PropDef,System.Object})
member.summary: Updates a set of properties for a file.
member.param: The file whose properties will be updated.A Dictionary containing the updated property values. Key = property object; Value = new value

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.ExplorerLoader
member.summary: Performs a partial load of Vault Explorer and returns an interface for making calls into it.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.Product
member.summary: An representation of a Vault product.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.ExplorerLoader.GetExePath(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.Product)
member.summary: Finds the installed path to the Vault Explorer EXE.
member.returns: The installed path to the Vault Explorer EXE or null if the installation path was not found.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.ExplorerLoader.GetExplorerUtil(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication)
member.summary: Gets an interface for making calls into Vault Explorer
member.returns: An interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.

summary.div: Loads an interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.ExplorerLoader.LoadExplorerUtil(System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Loads an interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.
member.param: The server to connect to.The vault name.The ID of the logged in user.The authentication ticket.
member.returns: An interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.ExplorerLoader.LoadExplorerUtil(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.ExtensibilityTools.Product,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads an interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.
member.param: The folder where Vault Explorer is installed.An folder for DLL overrides. Used in cases where the default Vault Explorer DLLs can't load properly. Vaule may be null.The Vault product that is installed.The server to connect to.The vault name.The ID of the logged in user.The authentication ticket.
member.returns: An interface for making calls into Vault Explorer.
